title: The Equations of Motion
text: Use the formula s=u*t+1/2*​a*t**2, where s is the distance, u is the initial velocity (0 $$\frac{m}{s}$$ in this case), a is the acceleration, and $$t$$ is the time.

title: Distance Calculation
text: Substitute the given values into the formula s=u*t+1/2*​a*t**2 to find the distance s.
